title: Recovery
body:
Hello Riot! 
I've played league of legends for 3 years and i stopped last year. When i decided to come back now, my surprised. I came back to being level 6 and I had lost everything. Including champions, runes, and my match history is gone. What can I do please!!!

replies.body: That's really odd!  It sounds like you might be logging onto a different account, honestly.  Hit us up through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) so our account team can take a look.  In the meantime, make sure you're logging with the correct username and region.
